WHY INRANGE?

Practicing at the range can feel like you’re simply spraying and praying, leaving you frustrated with your lack of progress, asking questions like “how do I know how far my actual golf shots are going with each club?”

Without live, accurate feedback, range sessions can even reinforce bad habits that can only be fixed with expensive coaching sessions.

Inrange eliminates that problem once and for all.  

HOW DOES INRANGE'S GOLF SHOT TRACKER WORK?

Inrange is a powerful radar ball tracking app that harnesses our proprietary radar technology to give you pinpoint-accurate feedback on every inch of your game in real time so you can make better decisions about what to focus on to get better, faster. 

Instead of just knocking out a bucket of balls, Inrange’s data shifts the focus to improving your handicap, one shot at a time.

CHALLENGE YOURSELF WITH OUR DRIVING RANGE GAMES

Our in-app challenges bring competition to the range while helping you focus on honing your accuracy and distance.

CHOOSE FROM:

∙ Shrinking Target
∙ The Longest Drive
∙ The Inrange Challenge
∙ The 3in3

Say goodbye to mulligans and directionless practice. Get your game in with Inrange. 

UNLOCK YOUR POTENTIAL WITH THE INRANGE HANDICAP™

Continuously improve your game by earning your Inrange Handicap™; our patented algorithm that constantly measures your performance across 3 categories of play (Off the Tee, Long Approach and Short Approach). It adjusts your handicap at the end of each day’s play to ensure you’re always playing at the edge of your ability. 

Every shot you play is instantly analysed and scored it against your personal handicap using our unique ‘Strokes Gained’ analysis so you can tailor your practice routine to bridge the gap between the golfer you are - and the golfer you want to be. 

CLUB AND SHOT DATA, SAFELY STORED FOR ANALYSIS

Inrange reveals what the ball is doing - and why it’s doing it - so you can start working on the areas of your golf game that matter. Inrange ensures you’re practicing smarter, not harder. 

Access instant and historical ball flight data and shot data in an intuitive interface that work seamlessly on your iOS device:

INSTANT FEEDBACK ON EVERY SHOT

With its live shot data, Inrange enables you to identify exactly what’s going on with your game, as it’s happening. 

View your shot stats on both iPhone and iPad and even compete with other players around you. This is real-time scoring and competition - at the driving range.
